instructions.title: There's some waste in this image
instructions.description: Tap once where you think you can see waste.

success.title: You found your first area with waste!
success.description: Swipe to the next screen to look for more

instructions.title: We're not sure about this one
instructions.description: Tap Twice to indicate there might be waste.

success.title: Nice. Use this whenever you're unsure
success.description: Swipe to the next screen to learn more.

instructions.title: Some of the imagery is missing here
instructions.description: Tap 3 times to mark the tile red.

instructions.title: Often, there will be no waste on screen.
instructions.description: You can just swipe to the next screen.

instructions.title: Find all the waste
instructions.description: Mark all the tiles using what you've learned. You can show answers if you get stuck

success.title: Well done, you found all the waste!

instructions.title: Let's try another trickier one.
instructions.description: Remember, tap once for waste, twice for maybe, three times for poor imagery.

success.title: Well done, you found all the waste!

hint.title: This is how the tiles should look.
hint.description: Swipe to try another again on a new screen.

instructions.title: It's all bad imagery... so many taps
instructions.description: When every tiles is bad imagery, you can swipe down to mark all tiles red.

success.title: Perfect
success.description: This could save you a lot of tapping. Swipe to learn more.

instructions.title: How to reset a screen?
instructions.description: You can undo and clear the color of every tile by swiping up.

success.title: Cool
success.description: This could save you a lot of tapping. Swipe to learn more.
